name: Traffic Racer Pro: Car Racing
description:
Traffic Racer Pro: Extreme car driving is a milestone in the genre of endless car racing games. Drive through highway traffic. Upgrade and tune cars.

Over 1 000 000 players have already downloaded Traffic Racer Pro!
Try to be one of the fastest drivers. Join the game now!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
· Compete against real racers for the first place!
· Drive by your own rules: join free driving mode with your friends!

CUSTOMIZE HIGH-END HYPERCARS
· New car customization system available!
· Replace rims, tires, spoilers, body parts, etc.
· Create a unique look for your car, add vinyls, stickers, change colors, etc.

THE LATEST, GREATEST & HOTTEST SUPER CARS
· More than 40+ realistic cars are waiting for you including: sports, classic, regular vehicles, muscle cars and powerful supercars and hypercars!

UPGRADE CARS
· Upgrade cars engines, braking torques, and max speed for better racing performance on highways.
· Add nitro to boost your car speed.

CAREER MODE
· Embark on a real racing journey in Career Mode, with over 4 chapters and 50 levels. There are always rewarding new challenges to experience in the career section of Traffic Racer.


Sick of endless racing games with a third person perspective?
Traffic Racer Pro: Extreme car driving and Racing in car might be the game you are looking for. Now you can drive your cars from an interior view through the endless traffic and realistic environments. Go as fast as possible, overtake traffic cars, earn coins and buy new cars. Eventually, become the king of the global leaderboards.

A mix of lifelike physics which has been the center point of Traffic Racer Pro Extreme Car Driving Tour, eye-catching graphics and extreme driving on traffic-packed roads is what only Highway Racing has to offer.


KEY FEATURES
Stunning 3D graphics.
Smooth and realistic car handling.
Extreme car driving in highway traffic.
Easy to learn and drive.
3D realistic car interior views.
Endless game mode.
Different locations and cars to choose from.
Realistic Car controls.
40+ different cars to choose from.
Advanced car customization through paint, decals, wheels, etc.

GAMEPLAY
- Tilt or Touch to steer.
- Touch the gas button to accelerate.
- Touch the brake button to slow down.
- Auto accelerate.

TIPS
- The faster you drive the more scores you get.
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash.
- Driving in the opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash.

Traffic Racer Pro will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.

Extreme Car Driving » » » Racing in car and Racing Limits
Try Racing In Car now to see how far the mobile racing experience has come nowadays.
